content.description: First bolts just right of Amore Eel that are left of the crack. Try not to use the crack to stay with a 5.10 rating. Use the crack to make the climb easier. The crack is a separate trad line.
content.protection: quick draws and standard rap cleaning slings
content.location: First right bolt to the right of Amore Eel

content.description: Start slightly left or right, below the first bolt, to utilize a small cam if desired. Easy climbing heads past the first bolt to a crux near the top of the climb. Use the two bolt rap anchor and chains to set up a top rope or rappel and clean.
content.location: Route in the middle of the Love Pillar

content.description: This buttress of sandstone is framed by a lay back crack to the left and the right. The climbs on this wall include boulder problems to the left and right on shorter walls. Amore Eel was the first route bolted at the Hermann Roadside Park. Amore splits the buttress pillar and follows a few bolts up the middle. Amore sets the standard for the area's route rating of difficulty by providing a solid 5.7 - 5.8 warm-up feel.
